articles.description:

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT tonykipkemboi.eth
Playing around with @developer_dao $CODE data using @AlchemyPlatform's `alchemy_getAssetTransfers` method. 
I used #python to get the data and manipulate it with #pandas and #numpy. 
The data should match what's on #Etherscan https://etherscan.io/address/0xbd82Cd2f7C2B8710A879580399CFbfF61c5020B9

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Andrii 🇺🇦
🛡 Web3 security tip:
Create a separate browser profile, not connected to any of your Web2 thresholds, for the hot wallet (like @MetaMask 🦊 and @phantom 👻) interactions - it will save you from connecting to malicious websites via random links(like email, Discord, etc.).
